UI: Content Card

Membership Card

The Membership Card displays subscription plans, membership tiers, and pricing tables. Features plan name, monthly/yearly pricing, included features, limitations, trial period, popular/recommended badge, and signup link. Uses Schema.org/Offer markup for pricing information.
